com.mumfrey.liteloader.api

Interface EnumeratorModule

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EnumeratorModuleClassPath, EnumeratorModuleFiles, EnumeratorModuleFolder, EnumeratorModuleRepository

    public interface EnumeratorModule
    LiteLoader Extensible API - Interface for objects which can enumerate mods in places.

    EnumeratorModules plug into the LoaderEnumerator and are used to discover mod containers in various locations, for example searching in a specific folder for particular files.

    Author:
    Adam Mummery-Smith

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void enumerate(ModularEnumerator enumerator, java.lang.String profile)
      Find loadable mods in this enumerator's domain.
      void init(LoaderEnvironment environment, LoaderProperties properties) 
      void injectIntoClassLoader(ModularEnumerator enumerator, LaunchClassLoader classLoader)
      The enumerator module should inject (as required) any discovered containers into the classpath.
      void register(ModularEnumerator enumerator, java.lang.String profile)
      Register loadable mods discovered in this enumerator's domain during the call to enumerate(com.mumfrey.liteloader.interfaces.ModularEnumerator, java.lang.String), the enumerator module should call back against the enumerator itself to register containers it discovers using the registerModContainer() and registerTweakContainer() callbacks.
      void registerMods(ModularEnumerator enumerator, LaunchClassLoader classLoader)
      The enumerator module should callback against the enumerator using the registerModsFrom() callback to register mods from discovered containers.
      void writeSettings(LoaderEnvironment environment, LoaderProperties properties)

      • enumerate

        void enumerate(ModularEnumerator enumerator,
               java.lang.String profile)
        Find loadable mods in this enumerator's domain.

        This method is called during loader PREINIT phase so do not use any game classes here!

        Parameters:
        enumerator -
        profile -

      • register

        void register(ModularEnumerator enumerator,
              java.lang.String profile)
        Register loadable mods discovered in this enumerator's domain during the call to enumerate(com.mumfrey.liteloader.interfaces.ModularEnumerator, java.lang.String), the enumerator module should call back against the enumerator itself to register containers it discovers using the registerModContainer() and registerTweakContainer() callbacks.

        This method is called during loader PREINIT phase so do not use any game classes here!

        Parameters:
        enumerator -
        profile -

      • injectIntoClassLoader

        void injectIntoClassLoader(ModularEnumerator enumerator,
                           LaunchClassLoader classLoader)
        The enumerator module should inject (as required) any discovered containers into the classpath.

        This method is called during the loader INIT phase.

        Parameters:
        enumerator -
        classLoader -

      • registerMods

        void registerMods(ModularEnumerator enumerator,
                  LaunchClassLoader classLoader)
        The enumerator module should callback against the enumerator using the registerModsFrom() callback to register mods from discovered containers.

        This method is called during the loader INIT phase

        Parameters:
        enumerator -
        classLoader -
